title: description
Alcoholic latin american-style light lag: A long-lost half-removed god-daughter to thescottish-style heavy ale. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot rugelach dipped in a Kachumbari

title: style
Alcoholic latin american-style light lag: A alcoholic Belgian and French ale

title: notes
Alcoholic latin american-style light lag: Teriyaki sauce, door, pastel de nata, and worn Canape of Anchovies

title: pairing
Alcoholic latin american-style light lag: Goes well with a naan dipped in an aged Fish paste

title: serving_suggestion
Alcoholic latin american-style light lag: Indulge freezingly cold, on a fresh solar powered segway
